nciThesaurus.definition: An inhibitor of Src tyrosine kinase, with potential antineoplastic activity. Upon administration, Src kinase inhibitor M-475271 targets and binds to Src kinase. This inhibits Src-mediated signaling and the proliferation of tumor cells overexpressing Src. Src tyrosine kinase, a non-receptor tyrosine kinase upregulated in many tumor cell types, plays an important role in tumor cell proliferation, motility, invasiveness and survival.
